topic.title: Hospital Discharge Diagnosis Section - conformance rules

section.p: The Hospital Discharge Diagnosis section describes the relevant problems or diagnoses at the time of discharge that occurred during the hospitalization or that need to be followed after hospitalization. This section includes an optional entry to record patient conditions.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:7979, CONF:10394 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.24"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15355)/@code="11535-2" Hospital Discharge Diagnosis (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15356)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:7981, R2.1=CONF:1198-7981)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:7982, R2.1=CONF:1198-7982)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:7984)
Conforms to Hospital Discharge Diagnosis (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.33)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15355)/@code="11535-2" Hospital Discharge Diagnosis (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15356)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:7981, R2.1=CONF:1198-7981)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:7982, R2.1=CONF:1198-7982)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..1] entry such that it (CONF:7984)
Conforms to Hospital Discharge Diagnosis (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.33)
